actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to establish a national standard to prohibit the operation of motor vehicles by intoxicated minors.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to withhold specified percentages of apportionments of Federal highway funds to States that have not enacted and are not enforcing, by October 1, 1998, a law that makes unlawful throughout the State the operation of a motor vehicle by an individual under age 21 who has a blood alcohol concentration of .02 percent or greater.

titles.title: To amend title 23, United States Code, to establish a national standard to prohibit the operation of motor vehicles by intoxicated minors.
